text: Harvest - Disband the Fyrd
Winter - Disband the Fyrd

My lord, spring is upon us yet we are blessed to be at peace! Some in the Kingdom wish to allow the peasants a respite, but others advise that we should begin drilling the Fyrd for combat in place of their usual service.
Fyrd: Peacetime Drills
Denied the chance to return home for Harvest, the Fyrdmen now wish to return home for Winter. We can bribe them to stay, but it will be expensive to maintain their supplies through the Winter.
It is time for the Fyrd to return home for the Harvest and reap their crop before Winter. We can bribe them to stay, but it will hurt our Kingdom's food production this Season.
A Plea from Westernas
A Plea from Westmoringas
An Offer from the East Anglians
An Offer from Mierce

Strat Clut, eager to regain their lost glory after the burning of the Alt Clut fortress, have mobilized against Westernas, a fellow Saxon Kingdom in the North. They implore us to petition the king in Jórvík to permit our forces to aid them.

The King of Jórvík has made clear his intention to declare war on the Kingdom of Westmoringas, in a bid to bring the last of the independent north under his control. Westmoringas sends a plea for our King to rise against our Masters in Jórvík and aid them in reclaiming Jórvík from the Vikings.
East Engle, long the rivals of the Kings of Jórvík, have sent us an offer: rise against Jórvík and lead our armies into battle. They offer gifts of gold from their wealthy southern Kingdom.

Mierce was once the rival of the Northumbrian Kingdom, but with the rise of Jórvík we have occasion to be their ally once more. They seek to invade the Kingdom, and request that we join their armies in attacking the Vikings!
War with Strat Clut!
War with Jórvík!
Djurby Offers Fealty and Peace
With both Ledeborg's army and their own defeated on the battlefield, Djurby now wishes to end their conflict with us. They offer to swear allegiance to us and rule over Deoraby in our name.
Noble Uprising in Kent

With Viking power on the decline our advisors have notified us of a golden opportunity taking place within the realm of West Seaxe. A large group of nobles have risen up against Wessex. Alone, their rebellion stands no chance, but with some help from our forces, this may be an opportunity to permanently weaken Wessex.
Vengence for Rhodri

The Kingdom of Powis, ruled by your Brother, plans for an invasion of Mierce to raid, take territory, and hopefully to claim the life of their King in revenge for the death of Rhodri the Great. Mierce's power is waning, and they are distracted by Vikings, but they still make a formidable opponent when they bring their full military might to bear.
